head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHODER, STEWART A., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHODER, STEWART A., JR.

block.p: SCHODER-Stewart A., Jr. Age 70, of Beverly Hills, FL, on July 29, in Edison, N.J. Retired Executive of the McCall Printing Corporation and R.R. Donnelley & Sons in New York. Former state deputy of New Jersey Knights of Columbus, former president of Edison (New Jersey) Board of Education, and a Knight of Malta. Survived by wife, Margaret Ann Grace, by children Stewart, Edward, Joseph & Helen S. Unangst, & by six grandchildren. Reposing at Gerity Funeral Home in Woodbridge, N.J., Friday, 2-4 and 7-9 P.M. Funeral Mass at St. James' Church, Woodbridge, New Jersey, 10 A.M. Saturday.

Former state deputy of New Jersey Knights of Columbus, former president of Edison (New Jersey) Board of Education, and a Knight of Malta. Survived by wife, Margaret Ann Grace, by children Stewart, Edward, Joseph & Helen S. Unangst, & by six grandchildren. Reposing at Gerity Funeral Home in Woodbridge, N.J., Friday, 2-4 and 7-9 P.M. Funeral Mass at St. James' Church, Woodbridge, New Jersey, 10 A.M. Saturday.
